comment: This professor did a really good job, he seemed very proficient in this field.

This professor is a nice guy, but he gave my group a forty on our first poster that we spent hours trying to perfect. We had a midterm that was really difficult that we barely had any preparation on. He was available via his office hours, which helped. He has no problem helping people out but is a harsh grader. I would pick a different professor.

Does not reply to any emails, so don't even try. Would not recommend him to any of my friends. Nice guy, but should not be a professor. I didn't learn anything at all from this class. We had two exams and he did not prepare us at all.

rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Worst lab I've ever taken. Majority of the time the class doesn't get the results intended for the lab. Terrible instructions to follow. He gave a midterm for some reason. Quiz every week. Make stupid posters that he grades way too harshly. Spent 3 hours in lab only to make a 76 on the lab result. Every day it's something else with this guy.
